Death Mountain Crater (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a frozen maze# hoards #a blast bag#.

Death Mountain Crater (Rock Grotto).text: They say that #the belly of a deity# hoards #a little love#.

Death Mountain Trail (Biggoron).text: They say that #plenty of sharp shafts# can be found at #the Market#.

Death Mountain Trail (Storms Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's left hand# is #a free heal#.

Desert Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that Sheik waits at a #monument to time# to teach #the lake's lyric#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the goddess of the sand# hoards #a dungeon pass#.

Gerudo Valley (Waterfall).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a danger dart launcher#.

Goron City (Maze).text: They say that #a shadow's prison# is on the way of the hero.

Goron City (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Skull Kid# grants #the dragon smasher#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #a lockpick# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

Hyrule Castle (Malon).text: They say that #the belly of a deity# is on the way of the hero.

Hyrule Castle (Rock Wall).text: They say that #an immense cavern# hoards #some scrub spit#.

Hyrule Castle (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #fishing in youth# bestows #some flashbangs#.

Hyrule Field (Hammer Grotto).text: They say that #a lockpick# can be found at #Zora's Domain#.

Hyrule Field (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #20 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the BOING! chain#.

Hyrule Field (Rock Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #mice bombs#.

Kakariko (Potion Grotto).text: They say that #the house of the dead# hoards #a master of unlocking#.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the goddess of the sand# is on the way of the hero.

Kokiri Forest (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #croaking choir's magnum opus# awards #a breakable branch#.

Kokiri Forest (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Ganondorf will appear in the next Mario Tennis.

Kokiri Forest (Storms).text: They say that high in the #Fire Temple#, Pierre hid #flashbang storage#.

Lake Hylia (Lab).text: They say that #a deep forest# hoards #a Band-Aid#.

Lake Hylia (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #a common coin# can be found at #Death Mountain Crater#.

Lake Hylia (Southwest Corner).text: They say that plundering #Gerudo's Fortress# is a foolish choice.

Lost Woods (Bridge).text: They say that the #Mask of Truth# yields #a broken heart#.

Lost Woods (Rock Grotto).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Lower).text: They say that the #frozen cavern# echoes with #a blue liquid#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a lockpick#.

Sacred Forest Meadow (Saria).text: They say that #the Gibdo's bane# can be found at #Hyrule Field#.

Temple of Time (Left).text: They say that #plenty of sharp shafts# can be found at #Goron City#.

Temple of Time (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a broken heart#.

Temple of Time (Right).text: They say that walking backwards is very fast.

Temple of Time (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an SOS call#.

Zoras Domain (Mweep).text: They say that the #treasure thrown by Princess Zelda# is #one percent of a curse#.

Zoras Fountain (Fairy).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

Zoras Fountain (Jabu).text: They say that the #Composer Brothers# hid #some danger darts#.

Zoras River (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a deep forest# hoards #the shake stone#.

Zoras River (Plateau).text: They say that plundering #the Graveyard# is a foolish choice.

Zoras River (Waterfall).text: They say that Bongo Bongo really hates the cold.
